name: Phantom Photographers
description:
Phantom Photographers is an FPS horror photography game where you protect a mall equipt with a ghost scanning radar gun and a Gh02T Dimensional Camera v2.

You can only patrol the mall for so long. Once the player's sanity has been depleted they will finish their shift for the night.

Getting attacked by aggressive ghosts or peeking through the dimensional camera for an extended period of time will result in the loss of one's sanity.

They aren't just in the humans! be aware of ghosts hiding in plain sight, some ghosts will manifest themselves into objects in their surrounding!

Programming - Ryan Armstrong

2D Art - Celeste Sinclair

2D +  3D Art and Sound - Chris Sinclair

Game Made for 2022 GGJ - Theme: Duality
